work.title: Verzeo
description: The first few months were training on ReactJS, HTML/CSS, JavaScript and Redux.
During training 'Student Result Management System' project was crated using HTML/CSS and JavaScript
In this Project a student can view result and exam information about them.
After completion of training, worked on building a project called Regional Info using ReactJS and Redux.
Regional Info, using this user can see the selected region onthe map and view the its information like region flag, currency, capital city and much more.

projects.title: RegionsInfo
projects.category: This is a map interface Project. In this platform User can login and view the regions information like total area , total population, currency , timezone and other detials. Using this platform user can Zoom in and Zoom out the map as they need and see entire globe.
projects.TchnologiesUsed: ReactJS, Redux, HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, JSON, Ant Design 5.0 , mapbox.

projects.title: Blog
projects.category: In this project a user can see the users and their posts details. Each post will have details and comments added to it. public can view the comment on the post also add their comments .

projects.title: Student Result Management System
projects.category: Using this platform, a student can search for result using Student ID and also can view score board of an entire course. Along with it they can see score board of the students where the studentâ€™s maximum marks and maximum attendance percentage will be highlighted.

projects.title: A Tourist Guide of famous Places in India
projects.category: This is a minor project on travel guide of the famous places around India. in this project we have around 10 different states of India in home page. when the user selects any state, they will see the list of tourist places within that state and also information about that place and any nearby places to visit around
